languages.text: "Чудо сохранило жизнь господина Данрока для разговора с вами. Его жизнь теперь в руках Императора, да смилостивится он над сим самоотверженным мужем".
"Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."
languages.original_text: "Чудо сохранило жизнь господина Данрока для разговора с вами. Его жизнь теперь в руках Императора, да смилостивится он над сим самоотверженным мужем".

traits.locale_text: "A miracle preserved Master Danrok's life so he could address you. His life now rests in the hands of the Emperor, may he have mercy on this selfless man."
"A miracle preserved Master Danrok's life so he could address you. His life now rests in the hands of the Emperor, may he have mercy on this selfless man."
"Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."
"Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."
"Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."
"Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."

languages.text: "Irgendein Wunder hat Meister Danrok lange genug am Leben gehalten, sodass er noch mit Euch sprechen konnte. Nun ruht sein Schicksal in den Händen des Imperators. Möge Er diesem selbstlosen Mann Gnade erweisen."
languages.original_text: "Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."

traits.locale_text: "Irgendein Wunder hat Meister Danrok lange genug am Leben gehalten, sodass er noch mit Euch sprechen konnte. Nun ruht sein Schicksal in den Händen des Imperators. Möge Er diesem selbstlosen Mann Gnade erweisen."

languages.text: «Algún milagro ha mantenido con vida al maestro Danrok el tiempo suficiente para que pudiese hablar con usted. Su destino está ahora en manos del Emperador. Que el Trono se apiade de su abnegada alma».
languages.original_text: "Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."

traits.locale_text: «Algún milagro ha mantenido con vida al maestro Danrok el tiempo suficiente para que pudiese hablar con usted. Su destino está ahora en manos del Emperador. Que el Trono se apiade de su abnegada alma».

languages.text: 「奇跡がダンロック氏の命を長らえさせます。彼の運命は皇帝の手に委ねられています。皇帝よ、この献身的な男に慈悲をかけたまえ」
languages.original_text: "Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."

traits.locale_text: 「奇跡がダンロック氏の命を長らえさせます。彼の運命は皇帝の手に委ねられています。皇帝よ、この献身的な男に慈悲をかけたまえ」

languages.text: “丹罗克大师能支撑到现在，还能与您交谈，这完全是个奇迹。如今他的命运完全掌握在神皇手中，愿祂垂怜这个无私的人。”
languages.original_text: "Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."

traits.locale_text: “丹罗克大师能支撑到现在，还能与您交谈，这完全是个奇迹。如今他的命运完全掌握在神皇手中，愿祂垂怜这个无私的人。”

languages.text: « C'est un miracle que maître Danrok ait survécu assez longtemps pour vous parler. Son sort repose désormais entre les mains de l'Empereur. Puisse-t-Il faire preuve de miséricorde envers cet homme si dévoué. »
languages.original_text: "Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un miracle que maître Danrok ait survécu assez longtemps pour vous parler. Son sort repose désormais entre les mains de l'Empereur. Puisse-t-Il faire preuve de miséricorde envers cet homme si dévoué. »

languages.text: "Üstat Danrok'un yaşamının sizinle konuşmaya yetecek kadar uzamış olması bir mucize. Kaderi artık İmparator'un ellerinde. Bu özverili adama merhamet etsin."
languages.original_text: "Some miracle preserved Master Danrok's life long enough that he might address you. His fate now rests in the hands of the Emperor. May He show mercy to this selfless man."
